attributes.action: Allow students to board weekly during Covid.
attributes.additional_details: A lot of students board weekly as it takes pressure of parents or there parents cannot take care of them during the week due to work, however by boarding fully parents are unable to see their children until holidays or half terms, the other option of not at all is also silly as if students didn't need to board they wouldn't be in the first place.
attributes.background: Allow students who are weekly boarder to board again as schools have been told during Covid students can only board full time or not at all.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual schools.
